tharana – udawela rajaye misha්ra patashalawe mulguruwaraya lesa sewaya kala disanayaka mulgurunnanse thama pasale sisu daru dariyange adhyapanika katayuthu kerehi menma awata pa්radeshawala dugi duppath pawulwala pasal noyana daru dariyange adhyapanaya nanga situwimata samaja sewakayaku lesa purogamiwa katayuthu kala aadarshawath guru piyeki.adhyapanika mattamin nodiyunu pa්radesha pilibandawa mana awabodhayakin yuthuwa katayuthuª kala hethema bingiriya pa්radeshaye nodiyunu gammanawala kuda daru dariyanata aluthin pasal aarambha kirimehila mahangu sewawak itu kaleya.nodiyunu gamwala mawpiyan, wadihitiyan ha game mulikayin eekarashi kotagena owun ha sahayogayen thawakalika kuda pasal godanangili idikala ohu ee sandaha adhyapana departhamenthuwe anumathiyada sahayogayada labagaththeya.aluthin aarambha karana lada ema pasalwalata thamage pasale guruwarun ha swechcha guruwarun yodawa adhyapana katayuthu karagena yamata katayuthu kala athara eda ewani thaththwayan yatathe athi kala sama pasalakma pahe ada itha diyunu mattamaka maha widyala ha madhya maha widyala bawata pathwi atha.meki disanayaka mulgurunnanse dadi kapakirimakin eda ee aarambha kala pasal athara ada diyunu mattamaka pawathina ihala kadigamuwa maha widuhala, punchi wilaththawa kanitu widuhala, molaeliya widuhala, hunnelembuwa widuhala, gatulawa widuhala ha koswaththa gamini maha widuhalada weyi.melesa nawa pasal aarambha kala disanayaka mulgurunnanse ada ihala kadigamuwa maha widyalaya namin sisun dahas gananak adhyapanaya labana ihala kadigamuwa pasala aarambha kirimehila mahathse purogamiwa katayuthu kala athara thama mulguruwaraya lesa sewaya kala tharana-udawela misha්ra patashalawe thama yatathe wu upaguru narasinha guruthuma kadigamuwa patashalawe thawakalika mulguruwaraya lesa path kirimatada katayuthu yeduweya.uthsawasha්riyen nawa pasala aarambha kirime dinaya me athara udawiya.
